landing.title: welcome
landing.subtitle: to FormerKit Dashboard
landing.body:
FormerKit can be mostly compared to other UI libraries out there, but not exactly.
The philosophy behind FormerKit is to build a white-label React component library by decoupling styles from component's HTML structure, allowing higly customizable user interfaces without the hurdle to build everytime the same HTML structure and React component interface abstractions.
landing.login_call: use the form to access your account

password_recovery.confirmation: in a moment you will receive an email with instructions for resetting your password
password_recovery.recovery_call: Enter the registered email to retrieve your password

sign_up.confirmation: You will receive an email with the instructions for activating your account
sign_up.invalid_email_error: for more information, contact your account administrator.
